Text:
Thanks JW I do appreciate what you are doing. 
However, I wonder if anyone else in interested in a Rush only torrent, without the extras. The extras: IBD; Imprimus: OutloudOpinion etc are at times longer and larger then Rush's show. I barely have enough time to listen to all of it. 
I don't want to look the gift-horse in the mouth. I'm just wondering in anyone else is interested in a more streamlined Rush torrent?
I've always wondered, what does the CF stand for?

Perhaps I can be of a bit of help:

CF means "commercial free" - just the show, no adverts.

ItBits - 
When you have the torrent open up your torrent program you should see a umber of boxes with a 'check mark' in the box. If you do not want to DL the indicated torrents its as easy as just 'unchecking' the box.
I do this as well. I just don't always have the time to listen to all of what is offered. 

Hope this helps.


Shut Up Maria!
Thanks Tainan, my torrent program, BitTornado, has that option in the "Details" window and I never noticed.
